Title: Microsoft's Exciting Agentic Solutions for Retailers and Brands
Author: Microsoft Cloud
Description:
Find out how Microsoft is shaping the future of retail and consumer goods. Shot on-location at Microsoft Ignite 2025 in San Francisco, this video explores the ways retailers and brands are unlocking new opportunities and solving longstanding challenges with responsible agentic AI.
